title: Adani wins bid to supply 6,600 MW of electricity, Rs 4.08/unit tariff beats JSW, Torrent
description: Adani Group has secured a contract to supply 6,600 MW of bundled renewable and thermal power to Maharashtra for 25 years at Rs 4.08 per unit. This bid, lower than current procurement costs, will help meet the state's future electricity needs. Supplies are set to begin in 48 months.
